verses.roman:
kasyācit pūtanāyantyāḥ
kṛṣṇāyanty apibat stanam
tokayitvā rudaty anyā
padāhan śakaṭāyatīm

synonyms: kasyācit—of one of the gopīs; pūtanāyantyāḥ—who was acting like the witch Pūtanā; kṛṣṇāyantī—another, who was acting like Kṛṣṇa; apibat—drank; stanam—from the breast; tokayitvā—acting like an infant; rudatī—crying; anyā—another; padā—with her foot; ahan—struck; śakaṭā-yatīm—another, who was imitating a cart.
translation: One gopī imitated Pūtanā, while another acted like infant Kṛṣṇa and pretended to suck her breast. Another gopī, crying in imitation of infant Kṛṣṇa, kicked a gopī who was taking the role of the cart demon, Śakaṭāsura.
